businessRule.name: Start with one assignment 1+0 pay all

template.description: Get qualified workers: pay if ${MAJORITY_VALUE} correct answers, start with 1 assignment, extend to maximum of ${MAX_ASSIGNMENT_LIMIT} assignments. Set qualification scores depending on gold accuracy.
template.name: Start with 1 assignment X+0 rule (pay all)

param.description: Normal accuracy level upper limit in percents exclusive
param.name: Normal accuracy level upper limit

param.description: Qualification score will be given to a worker who has demonstrated a super accuracy
param.name: Super accuracy level score

param.description: Percent (from 0 to 100) of correct answers when majority is found
param.name: Percent of correct answers

param.description: Worst accuracy level upper limit in percents exclusive, lower limit is considered as 0
param.name: Worst accuracy level upper limit

param.description: Number of correct answers
param.name: Majority value

param.description: Qualification score will be given to a worker who has demonstrated a low accuracy
param.name: Worst accuracy level score

param.description: Maximum number of assignments
param.name: Max assignments limit

param.description: Check every i-th gold question when evaluating qualification score
param.name: Check every i-th gold question

param.description: Normal accuracy level lower limit in percents inclusive
param.name: Normal accuracy level lower limit

param.description: Qualification score will be given to a worker who has demonstrated a normal accuracy
param.name: Normal accuracy level score

param.description: Super accuracy level lower limit in percents inclusive, upper limit is considered as 100
param.name: Super accuracy level lower limit

template.content:
<#include "extras.ftl" parse=true/> <#include "html.ftl" parse=true/> <#include "answers.ftl" parse=true/> <#assign FEEDBACK_ENABLED = true> <@hit contentCss="${applicationResourceUrl}/workfusion-resources/saas/ms/ms.bootstrap.min.css"> <@script src="${applicationResourceUrl}/workfusion-resources/bootstrap/js/bootstrap-tab.js"/> <@instructions title="

[Standard] Document Tagging Sample

"> <@editable id="__INSTRUCTIONS__">

<@form> <#if questions??>
<#list questions as question> <@report question=question includeAll=true/>
${question_index + 1}
<@editable id="__DATA__">Original: ${question.data.original_document_url}

<@answers question=question/>
<@submit text="Submit" />
template.name: [Standard] Document Tagging Sample

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config"
	scriptlang="groovy">
  	
  	<script><![CDATA[
		import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;

		result = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ocr_json.toString());

		if(result.xml != null) {
			ocr_document_url = result.xml.ocr_raw_processed_document_url;
		} else if(result.xmlForCorrectedImage != null) {
			ocr_document_url = result.xmlForCorrectedImage.ocr_raw_processed_document_url;
		} else if(result.html != null) {
			ocr_document_url = result.html.ocr_document_url;
		} else if(result.txt != null) {
			ocr_document_url = result.txt.ocr_document_url;
		} else {
			ocr_document_url = result.pdfSearchable.ocr_document_url;
		}	
	]]></script>
  
	<export include-original-data="true">
    	<single-column name="ocr_document_url" value="${ocr_document_url}" />
	</export>
</config>

template.content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <config charset="UTF-8"> <export include-original-data="true"> </export> </config>

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<config xmlns="http://web-harvest.sourceforge.net/schema/1.0/config"
	scriptlang="groovy">
  	
  	<script><![CDATA[
		import groovy.json.JsonSlurper;

		result = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ocr_json.toString());
		ocr_document_url = result.xmlForCorrectedImage.ocr_tood_document_url;
	]]></script>
  
	<export include-original-data="true">
    	<single-column name="ocr_document_url" value="${ocr_document_url}" />
	</export>
</config>

machineConfig.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <config charset="UTF-8">
<var-def name="exportType"> <case> <if condition='${sys.isVariableDefined("_sys_export_type")}'> <template>${_sys_export_type}</template> </if> </case> </var-def>
<var-def name="exportColumns"> <case> <if condition='${sys.isVariableDefined("_sys_export_columns")}'> <template>${_sys_export_columns}</template> </if> <else></else> </case> </var-def>
<var-def name="columnNameCase"> <case> <if condition='${sys.isVariableDefined("_sys_column_name_case")}'> <template>${_sys_column_name_case}</template> </if> <else>keep</else> </case> </var-def>
<var-def name="dataOnly"> <case> <if condition='${sys.isVariableDefined("_sys_data_only")}'> <template>${_sys_data_only}</template> </if> <else>true</else> </case> </var-def>
<var-def name="datastoreName"> <script return="item.getWrappedObject().getRun().getDatastoreName()" /> </var-def> <case> <if condition="${!datastoreName.isEmpty()}"> <insert-datastore datastore-name="${datastoreName}" create="true"> <script return="hit_submission_data_item.getWrappedObject().getItemValueMap()"/> </insert-datastore> </if> </case>
<export include-original-data="true" export-type="${exportType}" export-columns="${exportColumns}" column-name-case="${columnNameCase}" data-only="${dataOnly}"> </export> </config>
